Reviews.Title: Battery Issue
Reviews.Author: John E Phillips
Reviews.Content: It is just what I wanted; however, I was surprised to find that the battery was dead and would not take a charge.  I guess that this could be expected in a refurb'd unit.  I purchased a new replacement battery from Amazon and the world is right.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: SystemWorks IT
Reviews.Content: great machine. I bought two! very well built and solid. I am perfectly happy to buy more. Thank you very much!
